	thanks /*
	 thanks to sreenivasa viswanadha for suggesting how to get rid of expensive
	lookahead here 
*/ /*
	gather /*
	 gather modifiers for a or field 
	i 
	 i lookahead is then we are being called as part of a lookahead and we
	should not enforce any rules otherwise we validate based on context
	 field 
*/ /*@bgen jjtree classdeclaration declaration */ /*@bgen jjtree methoddeclaration declaration */ /*@bgen jjtree packagedeclaration declaration */ /*@bgen jjtree importdeclaration declaration */ /*@bgen jjtree variabledeclarator variable declarator */ /*
this originally handled postfix dimensions 

void variabledeclaratorid variable declarator #variabledeclaratorid # variable declarator 
{ token t }
{
 t=<identifier> t=<id e n t i f i e r> { jjtthis jjt this name = t image }
 { jjtthis jjt this addundefineddimension add undefined dimension } *
}
*/ /*@bgen jjtree arrayinitializer initializer */ /*@bgen jjtree formalparameters formal */ /*@bgen jjtree formalparameter formal parameter */ /*
	type /*
	 type name and expression syntax follows 
*/ /*@bgen jjtree type */ /*
	originally /*
	 originally called resulttype result type in the grammar
*/ /*@bgen jjtree returntype type */ /*@bgen jjtree primitivetype primitive type */ /*@bgen jjtree ambiguousname ambiguous name */ /*
 * expression syntax follows 
 */ /*@bgen jjtree assignment */ this production is to determine lookahead only /*@bgen jjtree castexpression cast expression */ /*@bgen jjtree primaryexpression primary expression */ /*@bgen jjtree methodinvocation invocation */ /*@bgen jjtree primarysuffix primary suffix */ /*@bgen jjtree literal */ this really should be decode but there isn't one as a result hex and octal literals ending in 'l' or 'l' ' l' don't work /*@bgen jjtree arguments */ leave these on the stack for arguments to handle /*@bgen jjtree allocationexpression allocation expression */ /*@bgen jjtree arraydimensions dimensions */ /*
 * statement syntax follows 
 */ /*@bgen jjtree block */ /*@bgen jjtree #formalcomment # formal comment retaincomments retain comments */ /*@bgen jjtree switchstatement switch statement */ /*@bgen jjtree switchlabel switch label */ /*@bgen jjtree ifstatement if statement */ /*@bgen jjtree whilestatement while statement */ /*
	do /*
	 do statement is just a while statement with a special hook to execute
	at least once 
*/ /*@bgen jjtree whilestatement while statement */ /*@bgen jjtree forstatement for statement */ /*
	the /*
	 the new jdk1 j d k1 5 enhanced for statement 
	e g for a arrayofints of ints { }
	we }
	 we also support loose typing of the iterator var for beanshell
	e  bean shell
	e g for a arrayofints of ints { }
